column1: Service Domain specification for Sales Product

column2: A sales product defines specific constraints and terms that augment the features of the base product it 'wraps'. It is used to support customization or core products to address specific market needs and opportunities with more  narrowly targeted products
A bank packages its Current Account product with features suited to students as part of a prospect campaign
A representation of a product as sold to a customer, covering the operational fulfillment requirements
Link to core/underlying product instance. Support specific product constraints/processing terms. Enable/link to additional service features
